oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Cleopatra Robinson from Aaron Boyd Robinson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to (sister) Cleopatra Robinson from (brother) Aaron Boyd Robinson regarding some of the soldiers that she knew. Aaron later became a doctor and moved to Murfreesboro, Rutherford County. Cleopatra married J. F. Rickman, who had been a prisoner of war in Delaware.
